qas.question: In this set there are 3 dogs and 2 cats. Are there more dogs or more animals in this set?
There are 4 apples and 1 banana. Are there more apples or more fruit?
There are 2 trucks and 3 cars. Are there more trucks or more vehicles?
There are 5 birds and 2 fish. Are there more birds or more animals?
There are 6 socks and 1 hat. Are there more socks or more clothes?
There are 3 roses and 2 tulips. Are there more roses or more flowers?
There are 1 cookie and 4 crackers. Are there more cookies or more snacks?
There are 2 frogs and 2 lizards. Are there more frogs or more animals?
There are 7 crayons and 1 marker. Are there more crayons or more art tools?
There are 3 cups and 3 plates. Are there more cups or more dishes?
There are 2 kittens and 4 puppies. Are there more kittens or more pets?
